TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITranslatorService

Docs.summary: The ITranslatorServiceClient interface specifies properties and methods to translate text in various supported languages.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<string> DetectLanguageAsync (string input);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<string> DetectLanguageAsync(string input) cil managed
Public Function DetectLanguageAsync (input As String) As Task(Of String)
abstract member DetectLanguageAsync : string -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<string>

Docs.param: A string representing the text whose language must be detected.
Docs.summary: Detects the language of a text.
Docs.returns: A string containing a two-character Language code for the given text.

remarks.para: This method performs a non-blocking request for language detection.
For more information, go to https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/cognitive-services/translator/reference/v3-0-detect.

Docs.param: The subscription key for the Microsoft Translator Service on Azure.
A string representing the supported language code to speak the text in. The code must be present in the list of codes returned from the method .
Docs.summary: Initializes the class by getting an access token for the service.
Docs.returns: A that represents the initialize operation.

remarks.para: Calling this method isn't mandatory, because the token is get/refreshed everytime is needed. However, it is called at startup, it can speed-up subsequest requests.
You must register Microsoft Translator on https://portal.azure.com to obtain the Subscription key needed to use the service.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the string representing the supported language code to translate the text in.

.property instance string SubscriptionKey
Public Property SubscriptionKey As String
member this.SubscriptionKey : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the Subscription key that is necessary to use Microsoft Translator Service.

remarks.para: You must register Microsoft Translator on https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.CognitiveServices/apitype/TextTranslation to obtain the Subscription key needed to use the service.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<string> TranslateAsync (string input, string to = default);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<string> TranslateAsync(string input, string to) cil managed
Public Function TranslateAsync (input As String, Optional to As String = Nothing) As Task(Of String)
abstract member TranslateAsync : string * string -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<string>

Docs.param: A string representing the text to translate.

A string representing the language code to translate the text into. The code must be present in the list of codes returned from the method. If the parameter is set to null, the language specified in the property will be used.
Docs.summary: Translates a text string into the specified language.
Docs.returns: A string representing the translated text.

remarks.para: This method perform a non-blocking request for text translation.
For more information, go to https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/cognitive-services/translator/reference/v3-0-translate.

Docs.param: A string representing the text to translate.

A string representing the language code of the original text. The code must be present in the list of codes returned from the method. If the parameter is set to null, the language specified in the property will be used.

A string representing the language code to translate the text into. The code must be present in the list of codes returned from the method. If the parameter is set to null, the language specified in the property will be used.
